queryClauses.customSQL: select rti.ir_task_id, '终端调试任务' task_type, rti.app_no, '终端调试任务['||rti.chg_mode||rtr.name||']' chg_mode, rtr.cp_no, rtr.terminal_type_code, rtr.protocol_code, rtr.terminal_id, to_char(rti.send_time,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') send_time, oo.org_name,'终端调试' OPER_URL from r_tmnl_ir_task rti, r_tmnl_run rtr, o_org oo where rti.cp_no = rtr.cp_no and rtr.org_no=oo.org_no #* #if($sessionAttributes.get("unitID")!="1") and oo.org_no like '$sessionAttributes.get("unitID")%' #end *# order by rti.ir_task_id
